inspiring-melody.name: Inspiring Melody
inspiring-melody.description: Play or sing a brief tune that stirs courage in your allies. The music lingers in their hearts. Target gains +1 D20 on their next attack roll. Duration: Until triggered or 5 minutes.

discordant-note.name: Discordant Note
discordant-note.description: Strike a jarring chord that rattles an enemy's concentration. The dissonance echoes painfully in their mind.

performers-presence.name: Performer's Presence
performers-presence.description: Your artistic confidence fills the space around you. Others find it difficult to look away or ignore your words.

ballad-of-fortitude.name: Ballad of Fortitude
ballad-of-fortitude.description: Weave a song of legendary heroes who endured impossible odds. All allies within 20 ft. gain +15 temporary HP and +1 D20 on GRT checks.

entrancing-performance.name: Entrancing Performance

special: Target cannot attack or move away from caster
Target may repeat save if damaged

entrancing-performance.description: Begin a performance so captivating that enemies cannot tear their attention away. They stand transfixed, weapons lowering.

symphony-of-war.name: Symphony of War

special: Caster must use 1 AP per round to maintain

symphony-of-war.description: Conduct an invisible orchestra of battle. Your allies move in perfect synchronization, their strikes landing with musical precision.

dirge-of-despair.name: Dirge of Despair
dirge-of-despair.description: Sing a mournful dirge that speaks of inevitable defeat. Enemies feel their will to fight draining away.

magnum-opus.name: Magnum Opus

special: Choose one: Crescendo of Victory (allies heal 5D10 HP, remove all conditions, +3 D20 for 3 rounds) OR Requiem of Ruin (enemies take 6D12 damage half physical/half sanity, Exposed, DET check Diff 50 or flee 2 rounds)

magnum-opus.description: Channel everything you have into a performance that transcends mortal art. For one shining moment, your voice or instrument produces something that will echo through history.

commanding-voice.name: Commanding Voice

special: Target must make DET check (Diff 25) or follow single non-harmful instruction
Must understand your language

commanding-voice.description: Speak with such authority that others instinctively obey simple instructions. Your words carry the weight of certainty.

rally-cry.name: Rally Cry
rally-cry.description: Shout words of encouragement that cut through the chaos of battle. Your allies remember why they fight.

political-acumen.name: Political Acumen

diceModifiers.applies: social interaction checks with identified individuals

special: Learn general disposition and motivations of up to 3 individuals you can see

political-acumen.description: Your understanding of power dynamics allows you to read a room instantly, identifying who holds influence and what they want.

filibuster.name: Filibuster

special: Outside combat: target delayed 10 minutes

filibuster.description: Launch into a speech so lengthy that your target cannot get a word in edgewise. Their frustration mounts.

incite-the-masses.name: Incite the Masses

special: Shift emotional state of up to 20 non-hostile individuals toward single emotion of your choice
Targets may resist with DET check (Diff 35)
Effect lasts 1 hour or until circumstances dramatically change

incite-the-masses.description: Speak to a crowd and turn their emotions toward your purpose. Fear becomes anger, apathy becomes passion.

denouncement.name: Denouncement

special: NPCs predisposed to distrust target
Duration: 24 hours or until publicly defended

denouncement.description: Publicly condemn a target with such conviction that others turn against them. Your words become the truth others believe.

words-that-move-nations.name: Words That Move Nations

special: Up to 10 targets must make DET check (Diff 45)
Failure: attitude toward one subject shifts by one step
Duration: Permanent unless contradicted by strong evidence

words-that-move-nations.description: Deliver a speech of such power that it fundamentally shifts the convictions of those who hear it. Minds change. Loyalties shift.

voice-of-authority.name: Voice of Authority

special: All creatures who can hear and understand must make DET check (Diff 55) or follow a single complex command for up to 1 minute
Commands causing obvious self-harm grant +2 D20 to resist
After effect ends, targets know they were compelled

voice-of-authority.description: Speak with the absolute conviction of one whose words shape reality. For a brief moment, your commands carry the weight of natural law.

cutting-remark.name: Cutting Remark

special: Target must be able to hear and understand you

cutting-remark.description: Deliver an insult so perfectly targeted that it strikes at the core of your target's insecurities. The wound is invisible but real.

pratfall.name: Pratfall

special: If moving, end movement immediately

pratfall.description: Point out an enemy's misstep at exactly the wrong moment, causing them to stumble. Timing is everything.

disarming-humor.name: Disarming Humor

special: Hostile target must make DET check (Diff 30) or have hostility reduced by one step
Cannot make hostile target friendly, only neutral

disarming-humor.description: Tell a joke so unexpectedly charming that tensions evaporate. Even enemies find it hard to stay angry.

mockery.name: Mockery
mockery.description: Launch into a devastating impersonation of your target, highlighting every flaw and foolish habit. Their allies struggle not to laugh.

fools-luck.name: Fool's Luck

special: When you or ally fails a roll, immediately reroll with +1 D20
If reroll also fails, gain 1 EC

fools-luck.description: Embrace the absurdity of existence. When everything goes wrong, something goes inexplicably right.

heckle.name: Heckle

special: Target must make DET check (Diff 45) or lose current action and any concentration effects
If casting a spell, it fails and resources still expended

heckle.description: Interrupt an enemy's concentration with a barrage of perfectly-timed insults. They cannot focus on anything else.

comedy-of-errors.name: Comedy of Errors

special: Movement costs double
Any roll of natural 1-3 causes fall prone

comedy-of-errors.description: Everything around your target becomes slapstick. Weapons slip, footing fails, equipment malfunctions in increasingly absurd ways.

the-last-laugh.name: The Last Laugh

special: Failure: Confused (D6: 1-2 attack nearest, 3-4 nothing, 5-6 normal)
Success: Half damage, no condition
Caster takes 2D8 Sanity damage from glimpsing the cosmic joke

the-last-laugh.description: Deliver the ultimate punchline - a joke so cosmically absurd that reality itself seems to crack. Those who hear it experience a moment of enlightenment that borders on madness.

spoken-word.name: Spoken Word

special: Target type determined by poem's theme (Sanity for melancholy, physical for aggressive)

spoken-word.description: Recite a short verse imbued with power. The words hang in the air for a moment before taking effect.

written-ward.name: Written Ward

special: Create ward on surface/object
First to read/touch gains +1 D20 defensive for 1 hour
Ward fades after triggered or 24 hours

written-ward.description: Inscribe a protective phrase on a surface or object. Those who read it feel a sense of safety wash over them.

poets-intuition.name: Poet's Intuition

diceModifiers.applies: detect lies, hidden meanings, coded messages, emotional subtext

poets-intuition.description: Your deep understanding of language lets you perceive meaning others miss. Subtext becomes text.

lasting-lines.name: Lasting Lines

special: Implant phrase of up to 10 words in target's mind
Cannot forget for 1 week
If phrase contains suggestion, target makes DET check (Diff 35) each day or acts on it

lasting-lines.description: Speak or write words that persist beyond the moment. They echo in minds, repeat in dreams, and refuse to be forgotten.

stanza-of-shielding.name: Stanza of Shielding

special: While temp HP remains, resistance to first damage type that strikes (halved)

stanza-of-shielding.description: Recite a protective verse that weaves itself into a barrier around an ally. Each line adds another layer of defense.

epic-invocation.name: Epic Invocation

special: Choose one: Heroic Epic (ally +2 all modifiers, +2 D20, +20 temp HP for 3 rounds) OR Tragic Verse (enemy 4D10 + KNW damage, COR check Diff 45 or convinced of doom: -2 D20, cannot be healed, 3 rounds)

epic-invocation.description: Call upon the great works of history - epics of heroes, tragedies of kings, comedies of fools. Their power answers through your voice.

name-of-power.name: Name of Power

special: If you know true name: 4D12 + KNW (bypasses resistances), Exposed 2 rounds
If unknown: KNW + FRS check (Diff 40) to intuit - success gives 3D8, Exposed 1 round

name-of-power.description: Speak a target's true name - not the name they were given, but the name that defines their essence. Power flows through the connection.

manifesto.name: Manifesto

special: Declare Manifesto of up to 50 words describing how something 'should be'
All who hear make DET check (Diff 55)
Failure: believe Manifesto is true, act accordingly for 24 hours
Success: feel compelled to argue against it, -1 D20 in your presence for 1 hour
Can be written and distributed; each reader saves independently

manifesto.description: Compose and declare a statement of such profound truth that it reshapes how others perceive reality. Your words become doctrine.
